text: An election to Limerick City Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 17 councillors were elected from four electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for an eight-year term of office.1 ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|5 | align=right|+4 | align=right|4,822 | align=right|22.94% | align=right| |- | align=right|4 | align=right|-2 | align=right|4,618 | align=right|21.97% | align=right| |- | align=right|3 | align=right|+3 | align=right|2,765 | align=right|13.15% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|-3 | align=right|4,267 | align=right|20.30% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|+1 | align=right|751 | align=right|3.57% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|- | align=right|3,518 | align=right|16.74% | align=right| |- | align=right|0 | align=right|-3 | align=right|- | align=right|- | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |17 | align=center|- | align=right |21,019 | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== ===Limerick No.1=== ===Limerick No.2=== ===Limerick No.3=== ===Limerick No.4=== ==External links== Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Limerick City Council election
